ISSUE.TITLE: Seaweed does not handle x-id
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: AWS SDK's emit an x-id query parameter which is not supported by seaweed leading to issues handling presigned requests

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: restore deletion audit of individual objects (#6644)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: skip headers when signing a request fix https://github.com/seaweedfs/seaweedfs/issues/6576#issuecomment-2724577279
